# Function size

Calculate the size of a matrix or scalar

    size(x)


### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`x` | Boolean &#124; Number &#124; Complex &#124; Unit &#124; String &#124; Array &#124; Matrix | 

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
Array &#124; Matrix | res
